General.Name: SSP Group PLC
General.Description: SSP Group plc operates food and beverage outlets in the United kingdom and internationally. The company operates outlets at airports, railway stations, motorway service areas, hospitals, and shopping centers. It operates approximately 550 brands in 35 countries. SSP Group plc was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Jamestown Wharf, London, United Kingdom, NW1 7HW
